tool_description: The slope formula calculator has great importance in both Mathematics and Physics. It helps to find the gradient (slope) of a line by taking two points or line equations as input.  In addition to finding the simple slope, it finds a whole lot of other slope and line characteristics as well.
name: Slope Calculator
title: Slope Calculator

api_list.name: Get Slope Calculation
api_list.description: Get slope calculation by adding x1, x2, y1, y2  values.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://slope-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/slope-calculation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slope-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://slope-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/slope-calculation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slope-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
